name: generator-nc-portal
description: Deployment of the static grunt project for portals
readme:
#Yeoman generator for a frontend developer ###usage You have to have pre installed "Node.js", "Bower", "Yeoman" http://nodejs.org/
http://bower.io/
http://yeoman.io/ Create a folder, open cmd/console and navigate to that folder. Type:

1) npm i generator-nc-portal
2) yo nc-portal
3) grunt ### License [MIT License](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_License)
